Quadrins historiques de la Bible. English. 1553
titleStmt.author: Paradin, Claude, 16th cent.

notesStmt.note: In verse; one stanza with illustration per page.
Translation (by Peter Derendel) of Claude Paradin's Quadrins historiques de la Bible, with illustrations by Bernard Salomon--Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Formerly STC 6675 (at reel 494:11) and STC 19184 (at reel 515:4)--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reels 494, 515) and Harvard University. Library (reel 1848).
